channel.title: CVE Feed for SAP SE -- SAP Internet Graphics Service
channel.description: The latest CVEs for SAP SE -- SAP Internet Graphics Service

item.title: CVE-2021-27626|2024-08-03T21:26:10.613Z -- sap%20se -- sap%20internet%20graphics%20service
item.description: SAP Internet Graphics Service, versions - 7.20,7.20EXT,7.53,7.20_EX2,7.81, allows an unauthenticated attacker after retrieving an existing system state value can submit a malicious IGS request over a network which due to insufficient input validation in method CMiniXMLParser::Parse() which will trigger an internal memory corruption error in the system causing the system to crash and rendering it unavailable. In this attack, no data in the system can be viewed or modified.
